title: Create specs/ directory structure and fixtures
description:
Set up the shared specs/ directory with feature files organized by domain, test fixtures, and configuration for both test runners.

**Deliverables:**
- specs/features/ with subdirectories: initialization/, issues/, workflow/, hierarchy/, dependencies/, queries/, comments/, wiki/, maintenance/, index/
- specs/fixtures/ with sample config files and issue JSON files
- specs/test-cases/ directory structure for YAML test cases
- python/tests/conftest.py configured to find ../../specs/features/
- rust/tests/features/ symlink to ../../specs/features/
- rust/tests/cucumber.rs configured properly

**Stub feature files:** Create placeholder .feature files in each domain subdirectory with @wip tags

**Acceptance criteria:** Both pytest-bdd and cucumber-rs can discover feature files (even if scenarios are pending/skipped).
creator: Ryan Alyn Porter
